attributes.title: Fortitudo, Bringer of Flame Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to beat Fortitudo, and nab the Fortitudo, Bringer of Flame Achievement oin Bayonetta.

attributes.title: Record Collector Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you where to find the first three records in Bayonetta, to get the Record Collector Achievement.

attributes.title: Record Fanatic Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows where to get records 4-7 (and explains the two extras) to get the Record Fanatic Guide.

attributes.title: Sapientia, Controller Of Seas Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show how to beat Sapientia, to get the Sapientia, Controller Of Seas Achievement in Bayonetta.

attributes.title: Naughty Tentacles Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show how to get the "Naughty Tentacles" Achievement in Bayonetta.

attributes.title: Temperantia, Manipulator Of Wind Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show how to beat Temerantia, to get the Temperantia, Manipulator Of Wind Guide Achievement in Bayonetta

attributes.title: Lustitia, Giver of Life Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show how to beat Lustitia, and get the Lustitia, Giver of Life Achievement in Bayonetta.

attributes.title: Rock, Paper, Scissors Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get a silly little Achievement in Ao2: 40th Day.

attributes.title: Hate Monger, Scavenger Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack stumble their way through an Achievement guide for Hate Monger and Scavenger.

attributes.title: Pumpkin Patch Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you an easy and immoral way to get the Pumpkin Patch Achievement in Army of Two: 40th Day.

attributes.title: Alfeim #2 Guide
attributes.description: Finchlynch shows how to beat the second Alfeim in Bayonetta.

attributes.title: Killing Spree Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you the first place to get Killing Spree in Dark Void.

attributes.title: Blue Light Special Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show how to get the Blue Light Special Achievement in Dark Void.

attributes.title: Bookworm Achievement Guide Part One
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you where to find the hidden Journals in part one of Dark Void, nabbing the Dear Diary Achievement along the way.

attributes.title: Prospector Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows you how to get an easy Achievement in Mass Effect 2.

attributes.title: Explorer Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack explain how to get the confusing "Explorer" Achievement in Mass Effect 2.

attributes.title: Big Game Hunter / Battlemaster Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Gus show you how to get the Big Game Hunter and Battlemaster Achievements in Mass Effect 2.

attributes.title: Titan Nebula Guide and Agent Walkthrough
attributes.description: Geoff and Gus show you where to find the Titan Nebula and nab the Agent Achievement in the process.

attributes.title: Brawler Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Gus show you an easy place to get the Brawler Achievement in Mass Effect 2.

attributes.title: Bioshock 2: Distance Hacker Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Knuckles returns from the depths of Rapture to show you the quick and easy Distance Hacker Achievement while giving some useful tips on the related Master Hacker Achievement

attributes.title: Bioshock 2: 5 Achievements
attributes.description: Knuckles brings the plasmid pain with not one, not two, but 5 Achievements covered in a single, bite-sized video. Featured bleep bloops include Prolific Hacker, Master Protector, 9-Irony, Unbreakable, and Bought a Slot. Which is NOT Bought a Slut.

attributes.title: Counterattack Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you one way to get the Counterattack Achievement in Bioshock 2.

attributes.title: Lost in Nightmares - Wish Upon A Star Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you where to find the 18 hidden coins in Lost in Nightmares to nab the Wish Upon A Star Achievement.

attributes.title: Kung Fu Fighting Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get the elusive Kung Fu Fighting Achievement in Resident Evil 5's new DLC, Lost in Nightmares.

attributes.title: Night Terrors Achievement
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to beat Lost in Nightmares on Professional, earning you the Night Terrors Achievement.

attributes.title: You Have My Sympathies Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how and where to get the "You Have My Sympathies" Achievement in AvP.

attributes.title: Desperate Escape DLC - Way of the Warrior Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you a few places to grind out the Way of the Warrior Achievement in RE5: Desperate Escape.

attributes.title: Desperate Escape - Shoot the Messenger Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get the very tricky "Shoot the Messenger" Achievement in Resident Evil 5's DLC "Desperate Escape."

attributes.title: Mount Olympus Item Guide Part 1
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff climb Mount Olympus and grab some Horns, Feathers and Eyes in the process. Sounds like the worst strip club ever. Kratos loves his strip clubs.

attributes.title: Mount Olympus Item Guide Part 2
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff keep killin' fools and taking names in God of War 3. This time they keep heading through Mount Olympus pickin' up Feathers, Eyes and Horns. Oh buddy!

attributes.title: Mount Olympus Item Guide Part 3
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff continue their trek through Mount Olympus in God of War 3.

attributes.title: Top of the World Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Gus show you where to nab the Top of the World Achievement in Just Cause 2.

attributes.title: Wrecking Ball Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get the Wrecking Ball Achievement in Just Cause 2.

attributes.title: Stunt Flyer Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get the Stunt Flyer Achievement in Just Cause 2.

attributes.title: Parachute Climber Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you, in a rambling way, how to get the Parachute Climber Achievement in Just Cause 2.

attributes.title: Exorcist Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Fragger shows how to get the Exorcist Achievement in Metro 2033.

attributes.title: Fore! Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Knuckles gives us his best Happy Gilmore impersonation by showing us how to nab the FORE! Achievement in Left 4 Dead 2.

attributes.title: Kite Like a Man Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Knuckles shows you how to get the Kite Like a Man achievement in the Left 4 Dead 2 DLC "The Passing."

attributes.title: Til It Goes Click Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Knuckles shows us an easy way to get "Till it Goes Click" in the new L4D2 DLC "The Passing."

attributes.title: Cache Grab Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Andrew show you how to get the Cache Grab Achievement in Left 4 Dead 2's The Passing DLC. Special useless commentary by Jack!

attributes.title: Return to Sender Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack take a trip down memory lane to get the Return to Sender Achievement in the newly released XBL game, Tecmo Bowl Throwback.

attributes.title: Not in My House Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get the easy to miss "Not in My House" Achievement in Iron Man 2.

attributes.title: Bubble Blaster Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack continue their Easter Egg hunt, this time showing where to find the deadly bubble blaster hidden away in Just Cause 2.

attributes.title: Two for the Price of One Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Fragger shows an easy way to get the Two for the Price of One Achievement in Episode One of Alan Wake.

attributes.title: Airport Terminal - 5 Achievements
attributes.description: Knuckles show us 5 Achievements (including 2 Secret ones) you can get on the first race in Split/Second.

attributes.title: Beat the Team Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Knuckles shows us how to get the elusive Beat The Team Achievement in Split/Second, which requires you to beat a 1:07 lap time in Construction Site in Detonator. Yowza!

attributes.title: Beat The Team II: The Revenge Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Back with a Vengeance, Knuckles shows us how the hell he managed to unlock Beat The Team II: The Revenge in Split/Second, which requires you to complete Power Plant in Detonator in under 1:18. Vroom.

attributes.title: Convoy, Fearless, Zero to Hero Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Knuckles shows us how to unlock three secret Achievements in Split/Second, Convoy, Fearless and Zero to Hero.

attributes.title: Sound and Fury Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you a nice spot to get the Sound and Fury Achievement in Episode 3 of Alan Wake.

attributes.title: Come One, Come All Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you an easy way to get the Come One, Come All Achievement in Episode 3 of Alan Wake.

attributes.title: Stay Dry (plus 4 others) Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Fragger shows how to get the following Achievements in Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands:Our Little Secret,Like Dominoes,Acrobat,Sand Nemesis,Stay Dry

attributes.title: Thinking Inside the Box Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how and where to get the "Thinking Inside the Box" Achievement in the Deniable Ops: Insurgency DLC for Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Conviction.

attributes.title: Scrotality Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how ton get the aptly named "Scrotality" Achievement in Fragger's latest Dead To Rights: Retribution video.

attributes.title: Street Sweeper Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get the "Street Sweeper" Achievement in Crackdown 2.

attributes.title: Open up a Can Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get the "Open up a Can" Achievement in Crackdown 2.

attributes.title: Strike and Pile Driver Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get the Strike and Pile Driver Achievements in Crackdown 2.

attributes.title: Your Lucky Day Achievement Guide, plus 4 others
attributes.description: Fragger shows how to get the following Achievements: Your Lucky Day, Action Master, There are Parts Everywhere, Targetmaster! and Fire in the Sky all in Level One of Transformers: War for Cybertron.

attributes.title: Co-op Keepy Up Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you an easy way to get the Co-op Keepy Up Achievement in Crackdown 2.

attributes.title: Car Jump Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get the Car Jump Achievement in Crackdown 2.

attributes.title: Pin Cushion Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you an easy way to get the Pin Cushion Achievement in Crackdown 2.

attributes.title: 4 Achievements
attributes.description: Fragger takes us back in to Singularity to pick up four achievements, "Up Close and Personal," "Put the Dead in Deadlock," "Night of the Living Revert" and "Revert Bomber."

attributes.title: Menu Hero Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Knuckles and Adam show you how to get an easy, but missable Achievement in Deathspank.

attributes.title: The Day the Music Died Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack give you some tips to get the "The Day the Music Died" Achievement in Deathspank.

attributes.title: Five Achievements
attributes.description: Knuckles and Casey crack open Death by Cube, and unlock 5 Achievements, ranging from the brainlessly easy to more tricky endeavors, all of which are ridiculously named.

attributes.title: Take Back The Knight Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get the Take Back The Knight Achievement in Deathspank.

attributes.title: Real Life Achievements: Start the Day with a Beer
attributes.description: Gav challenges Geoff to start his day with a beer. Will he succeed

attributes.title: 3 More Cube Achievements
attributes.description: Knuckles Dawson and ChurchsWife pick up a few more achievements in Death by Cube. Cubalism FTW!

attributes.title: Real Life Achievements #2 Driving on the Left
attributes.description: real life achievement driving on the left hunter guide walkthrough geoff gavin rooster teeth xbox 360 video game immersion car

attributes.title: Fast and Furious Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to beat the final boss in The Signal, in less than 30 seconds to get the Fast and Furious Achievement.

attributes.title: Tick Tock Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you where to find the 10 alarm clocks in The Signal, to nab the Tick Tock Achievement.

attributes.title: Liberation Day Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff step in to unfamiliar territory to bring you an achievement guide on the PC/Mac game STARCRAFT 2! Holy Zerg rush!

attributes.title: Splish Splash and Ding Dong Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Knuckles and Geoff bash some buoys in Hydro Thunder to get the Ding Dong Achievement.

attributes.title: Cardboard Companions Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get the Cardboard Companions Achievement in Alan Wake.

attributes.title: Words Will Never Harm You Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff, Jack and Gus give you some handy tips for getting the Words Will Never Harm You Achievement in Alan Wake: The Signal.

attributes.title: Humans Gooood Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Knuckles, ChurchesWife (Casey), Count3D (Dom), and Adam play some Hydro Thunder Hurricane, and against all odds, unlock the Humans Gooood Achievement. See how they did it.

attributes.title: Hail Mary Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack have some fun with tomahawks in the new DLC for Red Dead Redemption, Legends and Killers. In the process, they manage to grab the Hail Mary Achievement.

attributes.title: Cash Reward Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get the Cash Reward Achievement in Starcraft 2: Wings of Liberty.

attributes.title: Pick up 6 Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Griffon from Achievement Hunter show you an easier way to get the Pick up 6 Achievement in Madden NFL 11. This technique will also work toward getting the Butterfingers Achievement.

attributes.title: 4 More Madden Achievements
attributes.description: Brownman is back with another group of achievements for Madden NFL 11!

attributes.title: A Real Gentleman Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get the easily missable "A Real Gentleman" Achievement in Mafia 2.

attributes.title: Easy Money Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to earn some quick and easy money in Mafia 2.

attributes.title: 4 Passing Achievements
attributes.description: Brownman shows us how to get the following passing achievements in Madden NFL 11: Did I Break it, Defensive Dominance, Perfect Game, and YACtastic.

attributes.title: Ready to Ride Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you where to find the missing bike parts needed to complete your motorcycle and take Katie the hell out of Still Creek, in Dead Rising 2: Case Zero.

attributes.title: Locksmith Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to find and open the four locked doors to get the Locksmith Achievement in Dead Rising 2: Case Zero.

attributes.title: Chop Shop Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to defeat Jed the Mechanic to get the Chop Shop Achievement in Dead Rising 2: Case Zero

attributes.title: Still Creek Savior Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you where to find all of the survivors in Dead Rising 2: Case Zero for Xbox Live Arcade. Rescuing them all we nab you the Still Creek Savior Achievement.

attributes.title: A Bigger Taste... Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Griffon show you where to find all of the items needed to get the "A Bigger Taste..." Achievement in Dead Rising: Case Zero for Xbox Live Arcade.

attributes.title: Garbage Collection Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Griffon show you where to find the 10 hidden vacuum bots in Minerva's Den, the new single player DLC for Bioshock 2.

attributes.title: Close Shave Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Kerry show you how to get the Close Shave Achievement in Plants vs Zombies.

attributes.title: Nom Nom Nom Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Kerry show you how to get the Nom Nom Nom Achievement in Plants vs Zombies.

attributes.title: High Score Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Geoff show you where to find, and how to get the High Score Achievement in Bioshock 2's Minerva's Den DLC.

attributes.title: Most Dangerous Game Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Gus show you how to defeat the Shadow Broker's assassin Tela Vasir to get the Most Dangerous Game Achievement in Mass Effect 2's Lair of the Shadow Broker DLC.

attributes.title: Two Corpses in One Grave Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Gus show you how to get the Two Corpses in One Grave Achievement in Halo: Reach.

attributes.title: Lucky Me Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Gus show you how to get the Lucky Me Achievement in Halo: Reach.

attributes.title: If They Came to Hear Me Beg Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Gus show you how to get the If They Came to Hear me Beg Achievement in Halo: Reach.

attributes.title: Wake up, Buttercup Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Gus show you how to get the Wake up, Buttercup Achievement in Halo: Reach.

attributes.title: Crowd Control Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you an easy way to get the Crowd Control Achievement (Killionaire) in Firefight.

attributes.title: Everyone Knows Slappy Psychopath Guide
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you some techniques to take down Slappy in the awesome game Dead Rising 2. Oh yes. Slappy. You will go down.

attributes.title: Father of the Year Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you where to find the 11 gifts for Katey that are scattered about Dead Rising 2.

attributes.title: Look at all that juice! Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Griffon show you where to find, and how to combine all the food items in the game required for the "Look at all that juice!" Achievement in Dead Rising 2.

attributes.title: Chaos Generator Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get the Chaos Generator Achievement in Left 4 Dead 2's DLC "The Sacrifice."

attributes.title: Barrel Rolled Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how and where to get the Barrel Rolled Achievement in the new DLC "The Sacrifice" for Left 4 Dead and Left 4 Dead 2.

attributes.title: The Sledgehammer Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get the Sledgehammer Achievement on the level "Breaking Bagram" in Medal of Honor.

attributes.title: Dropping Deuce Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get the Dropping Deuce Achievement in the "Running with the Wolves..." level of Medal of Honor.

attributes.title: Fear the Reaper Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get the Fear the Reaper Achievement in the level "Dorothy's a Bitch" of Medal of Honor.

attributes.title: Manic Suppression Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to defeat the DShK in under two minutes to get the Manic Suppression Achievement in Medal of Honor.

attributes.title: Smooth Operator Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff pick up the "Smooth Operator" achievement early on in Medal of Honor. My medal is shiny!

attributes.title: The Twins Psychopath Guide
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff meet up with two nice ladies in Fortune City and have a really great time with them. Yeah. Totally.

attributes.title: Tastes Like Chicken Psychopath Guide
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff grab a bite to eat and MURDER THE CHEF in Dead Rising 2. Bon Apetit!

attributes.title: It takes a village...out Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get the It Takes A Village...Out Achievement in the Gunfighters level of Medal of Honor.

attributes.title: Like a Surgeon Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get the Like a Surgeon Achievement in the seventh mission of Medal of Honor "Friends From Afar."

attributes.title: Feeding the Pig Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get the Feeding the Pig Achievement in the Medal of Honor level "Compromised."

attributes.title: Right in the Grape... Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you where and how to get the Right in the Grape... Achievement in Medal of Honor.

attributes.title: The Quiet Professional Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get the "The Quiet Professional" Achievement in Medal of Honor.

attributes.title: Timber! Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how and where to get the Timber! Achievement in Medal of Honor.

attributes.title: The Impossible Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you an extremely easy way to get the following Achievements in EA Sports MMA: The Impossible, Hands of Stone, and Rock Out With Your Knockout.

attributes.title: Robots Tend to Blow Up Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you a good place to get the Robots Tend to Blow Up Achievement in Vanquish.

attributes.title: Madden Moments Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Brownman shows us how to get the Madden Moments Achievement in Madden NFL 11.

attributes.title: The Commander Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Fragger shows you how to get "The Commander" Achievement in Super Meat Boy.

attributes.title: Electric Slammeroo! Achievement Guide (Part 1)
attributes.description: Geoff and Griffon show you where to find the first 12 hidden Sumo Slammer cards, needed to get the Achievement "Electric Slammeroo!"

attributes.title: Six Years in the Making Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Kerry and Geoff show you how to find the first hidden Sasquatch (aka Bigfoot) hidden in the new Undead Nightmare DLC for Red Dead Redemption, nabbing the Six Years in the Making Achievement.

attributes.title: Level 1 Holocron Guide
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff are picking up Holocrons like old times in Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II. Join them as they run through the first level, Kamino, The Escape!

attributes.title: Level 2 Holocron Guide
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff are back in Star Wars: The Force Unleashed 2 finding the hidden holocrons in level 2, Cato Neimoidia, The Eastern Arch. Sounds menacing!

attributes.title: Level 7 Holocron Guide
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff are still hunting for those Holocrons scattered throughout Star Wars: The Force Unleashed 2. They head back in to the Salvation this time. Almost time to hit Kamino!

attributes.title: Coronation Chicken Achievement Guide
attributes.description: SPOILER ALERT: In this video, Geoff and Griffon show you how to get the missable "Coronation Chicken" Achievement in Fable 3. There are story spoilers in the video. Watcher be ware.

attributes.title: Tough Economy Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Kerry and Geoff show you how to get the Tough Economy Achievement in Call of Duty: Black Ops.

attributes.title: Carter's Helmet Avatar Award Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Kerry show you an easyish way to beat Winter Contingency on Legendary without dying, to unlock the Carter's Helmet Avatar Award in Halo: Reach.

attributes.title: Fly Like an Eagle Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get the Fly Like an Eagle Achievement in Sequence 8 of Assassin's Creed: Brotherhood.

attributes.title: 3 Bloody Achievements
attributes.description: Fragger shows you how to pick up three quick achievements in Splatterhouse, the bloody fun time. He goes for The Business of Killing, Morbid Dismemberment and Army of Dead Evil. Enjoy!

attributes.title: Knight Jumps Chesty Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Griffon show you how to get the Knight Jumps Chesty Achievement in Fable 3, and as a bonus, the legendary weapon in Sunset House.

attributes.title: Unstoppable Program Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you an easy place to get the Unstoppable Program Achievement in the Xbox 360 version of Tron Evolution.

attributes.title: Hopscotch, Roadrunner Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get the Hopscotch and Roadrunner Achievements in the Xbox Live Arcade game, Crash Course.
